# Change Log - @microsoft/sp-component-base

This log was last generated on Mon, 06 May 2019 22:35:04 GMT and should not be manually modified.

## 1.8.2
Mon, 06 May 2019 22:35:04 GMT

*Version update only*

## 1.8.1
Fri, 12 Apr 2019 16:07:20 GMT

*Version update only*

## 1.8.0
Thu, 14 Mar 2019 01:04:21 GMT

### Updates

- Upgrade Typescript to 2.7.2
- Upgrade Typescript to 2.7.2
- GA ThemeProvider and ITheme interfaces
- Upgrade to fabric 6
- Fix an issue where property change notification was not firing when the property has an array value in the dynamic data scenarios.

## 1.7.0
Thu, 08 Nov 2018 17:05:51 GMT

### Updates

- Promote the Dynamic Data APIs to public

## 1.6.0
Mon, 27 Aug 2018 18:06:28 GMT

### Updates

- Initial release of MSGraphClientFactory, for communicating to MSGraph for 3rd party developers.

## 1.5.1
Tue, 26 Jun 2018 14:50:55 GMT

*Version update only*

## 1.5.0
Fri, 01 Jun 2018 18:13:37 GMT

### Updates

- Introduce Beta APIs for Dynamic Data dev preview

## 1.4.1
Thu, 15 Feb 2018 01:56:14 GMT

### Updates

- Package version bump from 1.4.1-pr.2 to 1.4.1 by version policy

## 1.4.0
Mon, 04 Dec 2017 18:15:58 GMT

### Patches

- Replace @types/es6-collections with the typescript compiler's built-in es2015.collection library
- Remove beta tags from some APIs that are now officially supported

## 1.3.4
Thu, 26 Oct 2017 17:35:39 GMT

*Version update only*

## 1.3.0
Fri, 22 Sep 2017 20:19:09 GMT

### Minor changes

- Remove deprecated API item 'IClientSideComponentContext', instead use '@microsoft/sp-component-base:BaseComponentContext'.

## 1.2.0
Fri, 25 Aug 2017 20:31:17 GMT

### Patches
